A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This script deviates way too far\, cheapening the franchise. Whatever limits were set in previous films are broken. No longer do you have to be a well trained Jedi to use the Force in a super-human way. You simply only need to be born of a bloodline or be magically blessed. The film contradicts previous films and the end result is another silly Sci-Fi film that makes up the rules as the story evolves because the writers are too cheap to stay within the boundaries set by the original story-line.
